searching_prompt - Static variable in class voiceactivity.sample.R.string
 
setLocale(String, String) - Method in class voiceactivity.lib.VoiceActivity
Sets the locale for speech synthesis taking into account the language and country codes If the countryCode is null, it just sets the language, if the languageCode is null, it uses the default language of the device If any of the codes are not valid, it uses the default language
setLocale(String) - Method in class voiceactivity.lib.VoiceActivity
Sets the locale for speech synthesis taking into account the language code If the code is null or not valid, it uses the default language of the device
setLocale() - Method in class voiceactivity.lib.VoiceActivity
Sets the default language of the device as locale for speech synthesis
setSpeakButton() - Method in class voiceactivity.sample.VoiceSearch
Initializes the search button and its listener.
setTTS() - Method in class voiceactivity.lib.VoiceActivity
Starts the TTS engine.
shutdown() - Method in class voiceactivity.lib.VoiceActivity
Stops the speech synthesis engine.
speak(String, String, String, Integer) - Method in class voiceactivity.lib.VoiceActivity
Synthesizes a text in the language indicated (or in the default language of the device it it is not available)
speak(String, String, Integer) - Method in class voiceactivity.lib.VoiceActivity
Synthesizes a text in the language indicated (or in the default language of the device if it is not available)
speak(String, Integer) - Method in class voiceactivity.lib.VoiceActivity
Synthesizes a text using the default language of the device
